verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Give thanks with a grateful heart. Give thanks to the Holy One Give thanks Because He’s given Jesus Christ, His Son..

verse.name: V2
verse.lines: Give thanks with a grateful heart. Give thanks to the Holy One Give thanks Because He’s given Jesus Christ, His Son.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: And now let the weak say “I am strong,” Let the poor say “I am rich Because of what the Lord has done for us.” (repeat).
